features: FIGHT OXIDATIVE STRESS – Vitamin C helps fight oxidizing free radicals, which is good for you from your head to your toes. Quercetin does too—the only problem is absorption.Our quercetin is wrapped in a phytosome, which makes it 50 times more bioavailable than traditional quercetin.

ENCOURAGE HEALTHY IMMUNE FUNCTION - Quercetin and vitamin C both promote immune health: in a randomized clinical trial, quercetin encouraged a healthy immune response in physically fit older adults—and we all know how much immune challenges want a taste of 1000 mg of vitamin C!

PROMOTE OVERALL HEALTH – Quercetin helps promote a healthy inflammatory response. Vitamin C encourages healthy iron uptake as well as collagen production. Plus, what vitamin Cdoes for your body is complemented by quercetin. In fact, vitamin C and bioflavonoids are often present together in healthy foods such as fruits and vegetables, and citrus fruit.

INGREDIENTS MATTER - Sourced using only the finest raw ingredients with the purity and potency your body deserves. The majority of our products are non-GMO, gluten-free, and manufactured in the USA—and a Certificate of Analysis is available for every product we produce.

LIVE YOUR HEALTHIEST LIFE - For over 40 years, we’ve been developing advanced, effective formulas made with the highest standards and based on the latest scientific findings. We believe the answers to a healthier, richer life are within reach, and that rigorous scientific research is the path to get us there. Our formulations are created using the ingredients and dosages used in the studies that inspired them, ensuring that maximum bioavailability and efficacy is achieved.
body.description: Antioxidant protection, immune health and more Getting enough vitamin C is vitally important for overall health but the human body can't make it, so you have to get vitamin C through diet or supplements.1 In fact, some studies have shown that vitamin C supplementation supports certain aspects of cardiovascular health.2 Plus, vitamin C's biological activity is complemented by the health benefits of the flavonoid quercetin. In fact, vitamin C and bioflavonoids are often present together in healthy foods such as fruits and vegetables, notably citrus fruits.3 Ultra-absorbable quercetin for immune health and more There's a long tradition of using quercetin to relieve the effects of seasonal immune challenges. In a randomized clinical trial, quercetin supplementation encouraged a healthy immune response in physically fit older adults.4 Another randomized controlled trial found similar results in trained athletes.5 And in double-blind clinical trials, quercetin promoted a healthy inflammatory response, reduced oxidative stress and helped maintain overall health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Superior vitamin at a good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality Vitamin C
reviews.reviewText: Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that strengthens the body defense system and critical for the growth and repair of ALL body tissues. It actually boosts your blood antioxidant levels. Needless to say it is a major player to help support our immune system, absorbs iron and iron helps wounds to heal, and helps preserves our bones, teeth and cartilage. When Vitamin C is combined with the antioxidant flavonoid Quercetin it makes a powerful combination. Quercetin is what gives the natural coloring in some fruits and vegetables, and grains. Why is Antioxidants important? They help protect the cells from all those nasty free radicals floating around your body causes a host of problems like chronic disease, allergy issues, inflammation, etc. When you take a supplement, you want it to absorb. Phytosome is a natural active type fatty acid. When the Phytosome (fatty acid) wraps around quercetin it protects it and helps increase absorption because the majority gets delivered in the body instead of a good portion lost from breaking down from our digestive enzymes. I have been taking some of Life Extensions supplements for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No problems with the seller or the product.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this product for a sibling who wanted some vitamin C to help her get thru the flu season. She's had no issues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Trustworthy Brand!
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a vitamin taker. I take more medication for health issues than I'd like so I don't want to take more pills. COVID changed that. Last winter I was sick for 2 1/2 months straight. I live in Ohio and the cold mixed with runny-nosed grandbabies took a toll on my health last winter. I got pneumonia and it got a little scary before I finally pulled out of it. My mom has been on me for years to take vitamins but I thought I ate pretty healthy and didn't need them. I just had autoimmune issues that contributed to making me vulnerable to sickness. When the virus hit I was concerned but not overly worried. I isolated but still watched my grandbabies a few days a week. A doctor on social media began recommending people take a combo of Vitamin C, Vitamin D, and Zinc so I researched it. Everything I read supported that this combination helps boosts one's immune system which I needed with or without the virus. Winter was coming and I knew not only I'd probably be sick again all winter but that I also had to avoid COVID. But vitamins are unregulated and I had no idea which brand was reputable and would give me the dose promised without fillers that could be harmful. So I researched reputable brands and Life Extension made almost every list of reputable brands. I've been taking this cocktail of vitamins for the past 8 months and I've had one 3 days long cold the entire winter. My husband is taking them too. He has COPD and gets sick a lot too and he also has had one brief cold all winter. I'm still doing what I was doing last winter watching my grandkiddles and they still have runny noses and colds a lot but I'm not getting them and I'm very much in the high-risk category for this current virus with all my health concerns. This is amazing to us. I'll never stop taking these vitamins and I feel good that I know I can just reorder and know that this product will be consistent and do the job. It's a big relief when you're a person whose health is compromised and you need to do all you can to stay on top of it.

reviews.reviewText: I have a difficult time finding supplements and vitamins that are filled with silica and other fillers. These particular vitamins don’t come with as many as other brands and offer a quality dosage of vitamin c with bio-quercitin. I take these when I am starting to feel under the weather or am looking for an extra boost for my immune system.

reviews.reviewTitle: PRODUTO TEM FORTE APARÊNCIA DE AUTÊNTICO
reviews.reviewText: Demorou mas acho que é do bom.

Associação de w quercetina ao acido ascorbico potencializa a ação imunoprotetora que a vitamina C possui, protegendo contra infecções (principalmente viral). Não se observa com o uso, efeitos colaterais no aparelho digestivo (por ex. epigastralgia). Recomendo o produto
Estou gostando bastante do produto e recomendo.
